1479580.name: Land of Chaos Online II: Revolution - Golden Hero Pack
1479580.description:
Special gifts for supporting the developers before LOCO II Revolution releasing.

Golden Hero Pack


  • Earn the "Golden Hero" role on the LOCO II Discord, with custom colors/names
  • Display separately from online discord member list
  • 1 Permanent LOCO II:Revolution game access key.
  • 1 Gift/Tradable game access key.
  • In game title: "Golden Hero"
  • 2 Founder's Costume piece box
    • Grants a Random Founder's Armor, Glove, Shoes, Helmet Costume piece
  • 800 Battle Gold + 100 Bonus
  • 14 Day +%50 EXP boost
  • 1 Inventory Slot Bag
    • Inventory Slot Bag is a 7 Slot inventory expansion
  • 1 Depot Slot Bag
    • Depot Slot Bag is a 6 Slot depot expansion

Please note 3 things:


1- This DLC (Founder pack) is not upgradable or refundable.
2- Only one founder pack can purchased.
3- In-game gifts will be distributed when LOCOII:Revolution early access is released. You can claim them in the lobby: ESC>DLC>Check Founder pack DLC

Please join and contact to Noira#0001 if you want to claim the Discord and key gifts.
Please contact loco@lolizen.com if you want to claim only the key gifts.

This Founder pack (aka dlc) was created for those unable to use Paypal or Patreon.
There may be price differences due to Steam pricing and taxes.

More info:
Founder pack DLC will only be available until early access has released.
1479580.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
